attributes.action: Designate 11th day 11th  month Armistice Day a public holiday like France .
attributes.additional_details:
Obvious reasons. Respect
 Imprint on people's memory.
Acknowledge the relief we felt on that day
attributes.background: Make armistice day a public holiday.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition, which calls for similar action: "Make Armistice Day a bank holiday" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/750643
